alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 14 at 7:41PM CST until November 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Locally higher amounts of up to 10 inches are possible for the higher terrain of southern Lake around Finland, and also far eastern Cook along the Gunflint Trail. * WHERE...Northern Cook and Lake and Southern Lake Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore
